results.name: Array T(n,k) = k^2*n^2+5*k*n+1, read by antidiagonals.
comment: Rows include A082111, A082112. The main diagonal is A082113. The diagonal sums are A082114.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Apr 04 2003
